ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Eric van der Zwan for preparing the aggregated NICE dataset and for support with data-management, and Jeroen Alblas for support with data management.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was financed from the regular budget of the Centre for Infectious Disease Control made available by the Ministry of Health, Welfare and Sport, project number V/150207.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets generated and/or analyzed during the current study are not publicly available as they are part of a national registry for quality monitoring, but are available from the authors on reasonable request and with permission from the NICE registry.
